enhancement(dev): add IntelliJ configuration. #3954

Merge pull request #3954 from keturn/maint/dot-idea
fix(.idea): remove per-user files(1)
fix(.idea): remove per-user files(2)
fix(.idea): Choose shortenClasspath used by java8 and java9+

chore(.idea): remove test run configuration for module
Change engine test runconfiguration for run all tests

chore(.idea): return .idea/misc.xml and set project-jdk-name to "11"
chore(.idea): Change README for info about Java and JDK within IDEA
fix(.idea): remove mark README as Plaintext
docs(README): put the Java requirements next to the Direct Download information

Merge pull request #3974 from MovingBlocks/topic/idea-fixes

Cleanup run configurations
gitignored addition pre-user files
Update README

feat: Only show "augmentation" modules initially (#3973)

This will only show modules from the "augmentation" category in the
advanced game setup to slim down the overwhelming list a bit.

- Game mode modules should be selected via the game play drop down even
  before entering detailed setup
- Game modes often come with their default world generator tailored for
  the game mode, thus fiddling with that is also an "advanced" use case
- Special modules are ... special
- Libraries only make sense in combination with other modules anyways
- Assets may be part of that list in addition to augmentation modules...

feat: Add updateComponent and upsertComponent functional methods (#3977)

doc: Add more JavaDoc for MutableComponentContainer
build(idea): Import classes instead of fully qualified names

Let lwjgl do its own path hacking. Fixes compatibility with some newer JREs.

http://wiki.lwjgl.org/wiki/LWJGL_Hidden_Switches.html#Hidden_Switches
LWJGLHelper: set path for libjinput

feat(build): examples of how to set native library path

for gradle and intellij

build(idea): Import classes instead of fully qualified names

Merge pull request #3980 from MovingBlocks/fix/idea-settings
Merge PR #3937 by @keturn - pathing tweak
Move the lib addition to a new unique exec task that also sets permissive mode to let KComputers work
Remove unused import
Add "return-basic-setup" label to ukrainian translate
Add a few labels to russian translate
Fix translation

Merge pull request #3985 from AlexHladin/chore/update-languages-label

Update languages label

gradle: modernize dependency declarations

these were deprecated.

gradle: update snowplow to 0.9.0

they've started publishing to jcenter and bintray, no longer need their own repository.
gradle: it's spelled EXCLUDE
tidy unused import
gradle upgrade to 6.4.1
gradle: use java "application" plugin for the facade.

update gradle & groovy wrappers

makes groovy work with post-2018 gradle.
https://github.com/MovingBlocks/groovy-wrapper/pull/4

gradle(modules): skip modules without modules.txt

and remove some redundant directory-setting
maint(gradle): tidy some repository declarations
feat(facades): provide run tasks
maint(gradle): tidy
maint(gradle): snowplow needn't be both impl and api
feat(groovyw): don't refresh build.gradle for directories without module.txt
maint(gradle): clean up logging/prints
maint(gradle): allowInsecureProtocol where necessary
maint: include module classes in :facades:PC:run

fix(engine): null checks and exception messages

For various things I ran in to while my build was a little messed up. Doesn't make things less broken, but hopefully makes it easier to see what the broken part is.
fix(build): artifactory is insecure 😱

fix(build): be sure copyResourcesToClasses always runs when `classes` task does

`classes` depends on both compileJava and resources.

This is enabling the jank, but I am trying to limit the scope of this PR.
fix(build): remove stray debug settings

doc(gradle): insecure repositories are scary

Co-authored-by: Tobias Nett <skaldarnar@googlemail.com>

refactor(engine): prefer `orElseThrow` on Option instead of try/catch

Co-authored-by: Tobias Nett <skaldarnar@googlemail.com>
refactor(build): declare module test dependencies

fix: Prevent NPE in ModuleDetailsScreen (#3986)

* fix: Prevent NPE in ModuleDetailsScreen when optional dependency is missing

Fixes #3981

Even though we did check against `null` in the first place, we nevertheless accessed this possible `null` value a couple of lines later 🙄
This is fixed by simplifying the way we set the canvas mode.
refactor(build): remove duplicate api & implementation dependencies
chore(build): match crashreporter version to engine's

chore: tidying

reviewers assure me these aren't needed
doc: explain why this asset gets extra error handling
config(idea): wrap long lines at some point

fix: Respawn dead player after exiting the game  (#3983)

Minimal fix for "undead" players (zero health) joining again after quitting from the death info screen.

Co-authored-by: Tobias Nett <skaldarnar@googlemail.com>

feat(build): upgrade gradle to 6.4 from 6.0

      one stores the parent node's uri for easy querying later.
    Then when connecting a connection to another, you can store a uri
    for a node on the other end. This is particularly needed for
    output connections, because you need to check and possibly reconnect these if
    you tamper with the dag. This is not yet implemented, but must be used
    at least for Rendering API for modules.

feat: add retain components component (#3910)

- adds `retainComponentsComponent` that contains components that are supposed to be retained when placing a block
- background: on placing a block, `EntityAwareWorldProvider::updateBlockEntityComponents` removes all components from the entity of the block to be placed that
  - are not any of `NetworkComponent`, `BlockComponent`, and `LocationComponent`
  - don't have `retainUnalteredOnBlockChange` metadata
  - are not listed in the block prefab
  - are not in the set of components to be retained (which was hard-coded to `emptySet` until now)
- adds a check for `retainComponentsComponent` in `EntityAwareWorldProvider::setBlocks` and if present passes the set of components to retain instead of `emptySet`
- requires `@Replicate` to work in multiplayer for joining players too and not only for the host

- adds `.gitattributes` with entries for .jpeg, .dylib, .ogg, and .dbg

- can be visualized e.g. using graphviz using dot -Tsvg dependencies.dot > dependencies.svg

chore(groovyw): Add command to list local modules (#3952)

Adds a flag '--local' that can be added to `groovyw module list` in
order to only list modules that are present locally as source.

The output of this command is machine readable such that it can be used
easily to perform some command for all modules.

For instance, the following Bash command will reset and update all
modules:

```sh
for m in $(./groovyw module list --local)
do
    pushd modules/$m
    git reset --hard HEAD
    git pull
    popd
done
```
